title: A Small Project: YAMS
content:
Check out my fork of [Roger Gonzalez's YAMS script](https://gitlab.com/rogs/yams), which adds the ability to select your configuration directory. I plan to keep track of updates from the Master branch when they occur.

LINKS TO MENTIONED PROJECT:

[my YAMS fork](https://gitlab.com/anoraktrend/yams)
